name: regreen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cover land with grass, trees, and other plants again in order to return it to a healthy state: The area has been regreened since the war. City leaders are trying to re-green Seattle by saving older trees and planting new ones on public and private property.
More examplesFewer examplesWith that money, we could re-green a million acres of wasteland.We will be able to regreen areas that were destroyed.The regreening effort is the biggest challenge facing the country.
